patch:
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index b7b5eb7..8179841 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -69,7 +69,10 @@
             "items": {
               "type": "string"
             },
-            "default": ["node_modules", ".git"],
+            "default": [
+              "node_modules",
+              ".git"
+            ],
             "description": "The glob patterns of ignored path while generate tree string for directory"
           },
           "asciiTreeGenerator.directoryMaxDepth": {
@@ -146,6 +149,6 @@
     "vscode-test": "^1.5.2"
   },
   "dependencies": {
-    "glob": "^7.1.3"
+    "glob": "^10.3.12"
   }
 }
diff --git a/src/lib/directory.ts b/src/lib/directory.ts
index 4b455d4..3e50d3e 100644
--- a/src/lib/directory.ts
+++ b/src/lib/directory.ts
@@ -4,6 +4,8 @@ import * as path from 'path';
 import { promisify } from 'util';
 import { IFileStat, IFileTreeItem, IListDirectoryConfig } from './interface';
 
+import { glob as rawGlob } from 'glob';
+
 const glob = promisify(rawGlob);
 const readStat = promisify(fs.stat);
 
diff --git a/src/test/suite.ts b/src/test/suite.ts
index 8ced9b1..8fec35e 100644
--- a/src/test/suite.ts
+++ b/src/test/suite.ts
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 import * as path from 'path';
 import * as Mocha from 'mocha';
-import * as glob from 'glob';
+import { globSync } from 'glob';
 
 export function run(): Promise<void> {
   // Create the mocha test
@@ -12,10 +12,7 @@ export function run(): Promise<void> {
   const testsRoot = path.resolve(__dirname, '..');
 
   return new Promise((c, e) => {
-    glob('**/**.test.js', { cwd: testsRoot }, (err, files) => {
-      if (err) {
-        return e(err);
-      }
+        const files = globSync('**/**.test.js', { cwd: testsRoot });
 
       // Add files to the test suite
       files.forEach((f) => mocha.addFile(path.resolve(testsRoot, f)));
